text: Padde Huli is a 2019 Indian Kannada language action drama film written by K. Manju and directed by Guru Deshpande. Produced by M. Ramesh Reddy, film's music is scored by B. Ajaneesh Loknath. Shreyas Manju and Nishvika Naidu feature in lead roles along with V. Ravichandran, Sudharani and playing the supporting characters while Rakshit Shetty and Puneeth Rajkumar appears in a guest role. K. S. Chandrashekar is the cinematographer of the film under the banner of Tejaswini Enterprises. This movie is based on the 2017 Tamil film Meesaya Murukku. == Cast == * Shreyas Manju as Sampath * Nishvika Naidu as Sangeetha * V. Ravichandran as Sampath's father * Sudharani as of Sampath's mother * Chikkanna * Vinayak Joshi * Dharamanna Kadur * Amith Vishwanath * Madhusudhan Rao *Sundar Ram *Swathi Gurudatt *Bhaskar Surya * Rakshit Shetty as Karna (Cameo appearance) * Puneeth Rajkumar as Himself (Cameo appearance) == Soundtrack == The soundtrack is composed by B. Ajaneesh Loknath. == References == == External links == * Category:2019 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Kannada-language films Category:2010s musical drama films Category:Kannada remakes of Tamil films Category:2019 drama films
title: Padde Huli
